subject: Question about controller for Simsonn Vam Pro
description_text:
Hello, I am considering purchasing Simsonn Vam Pro motors and would like to know which controller is required to connect them - Simsonn Pro x or Simsonn plus x? Which controller is better/newer?
I will be using these motors with Moza pedals, as I do not have Simsonn pedals.

Thanks in advance,
Evgeny

conversations.body_text: Hi Евгений Дутов,     You may consider purchasing the ProX Ultra pedals or the PlusX pedals, as both provide excellent support for the VAM Pro. In comparison, the regular ProX pedals offer less optimal support because their hardware does not support bidirectional control of the voice coil motor.     Вы можете приобрести педали ProX Ultra или PlusX — они отлично поддерживают работу с VAM Pro.  Обычные педали ProX поддерживают VAM Pro не так хорошо, так как их аппаратная часть не позволяет осуществлять двунаправленное управление голосовой катушкой.
